body.p: This Basis for Conclusions summarises the International Accounting Standards Board’s considerations in developing IFRS 10 Consolidated Financial Statements. Individual Board members gave greater weight to some factors than to others. Unless otherwise stated, any reference below to IAS 27 is to IAS 27 Consolidated and Separate Financial Statements, and to IAS 28 is to IAS 28 Investments in Associates.
